00001 #ifndef DELTA_FUNCTOR_H
00002 #define DELTA_FUNCTOR_H
00003 
00004 #include <list>
00005 
00006 //The functor class allows for a generic change in a variable to take place over
00007 //a certain length of time. So if I want to say that at time 2000, theta is 0 degrees
00008 //and at 4000, theta is 360 degrees, then this would make it possible.
00009 //Use GetValue() to get the value for the current time.
00010 //Note that the functor returns beginValue if it is before startTime
00011 //and endValue if it is after endTime. This should be changed so that
00012 //both of these calls are 0, since this would be nice for extension
00013 //reasons.
00014 class Delta_Functor
00015 {
00016 private:
00017     int totalStartTime;
00018     int totalEndTime;
00019     int totalTimeRange;
00020     int startTime;
00021     int endTime;
00022     double timeRange;
00023     double startValue;
00024     double endValue;
00025     double valueRange;
00026     double exponent;
00027 
00028     //Bools to tell what kind of functor it is
00029     bool isCyclic;
00030     bool isBounceBack;
00031 
00032     std::list<Delta_Functor> functors;
00033 public:
00034     Delta_Functor();
00035     Delta_Functor(int start_time, int end_time, double start_value, double end_value, double exp);
00036     Delta_Functor operator=(const Delta_Functor toEqual);
00037 
00038     Delta_Functor addFunctor(const Delta_Functor toAdd);
00039         Delta_Functor operator +(const Delta_Functor& toAdd);
00040 
00041         bool operator >(const Delta_Functor&);
00042         bool operator <(const Delta_Functor&);
00043         //bool operator ==(Delta_Functor);
00044 
00045     //Return the value
00046     //double operator()();
00047     double getValue();
00048 
00049     void reverse();
00050 
00051     void shiftTime(int toShift);
00052     void reset();
00053     void makeBounceBack();
00054     void unMakeBounceBack();
00055     void makeCyclic();
00056     void unMakeCyclic();

00058     bool isComplete();
00059     void deleteChildren();
00060 
00061     Delta_Functor cat(const Delta_Functor toCat);
00062 };
